channel.title: If you want to talk about the American election
channel.description:
Open up a notepad, or alternative text file.
Write down all your ramblings in there, print it off, take a shit on it. Eat it and then finally go fuck a nun.
I really, do not care about your overrated presidential election. It's screwed up and it's sad. You think change is coming - I see youtube vids of Americans dancing around the streets in joy yet you're all fed bullshit - AND you all believe it. Your education is biased, your entire life is based around false information fed through politicians who fill you with propaganda and patriotism.
Now, seriously any more threads and I might actually be forced to move to America and run for president.
If anyone replied to this topic discussing the election I will kill them. If anyone replies disagreeing with me (for whatever reason; freedom of speech etc) - I will kill them.
You can reply with your agreements though, that is OK.

item.title: If you want to talk about the American election
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:114, topic:241531”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=317880.msg2529437#msg2529437 date=1226374246]

Any objections for me banning army_life?

None whatsoever.

Then why the Hell didn’t you ban him when I asked you to the other day?
[/quote]

i asked him to bake me a nice steaming plate of cookies but i didnt get it either…
These mods are playing favorites :’([/quote]
I don’t remember that request.

Read full topic

item.title: If you want to talk about the American election
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:110, topic:241531”][quote author=army_life link=topic=317880.msg2527180#msg2527180 date=1226253316]

[quote author=the bank link=topic=317880.msg2526875#msg2526875 date=1226240390]

someone truly superior would be able to prove there point in fewer words, not more
[/quote]You are right. I will take a crack at it…

USA Sucks.

kdone.

Army_life, was this:

ok im the one who said America invaded china and USA has not wo a modern war stfu nigger

Supposed to be taking a crack at me?

I didn’t sate they invaded China, I stated they invaded Canada, which if you were to put your simpleton reading-skills to the test, you could see was true. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/War_of_1812 And I quote:

The US initially tried repeatedly to invade Canada and failed;

And to your next point, Desert Strom was not a war, it was an Operation that took place in the Persian Gulf War. The USA was not the only country involved. It was not the sole victory of the war.

It was a typo I meant Canada and its funny I’m making real facts and everyone gangs up on me for being right and not for you just because you are a ignorant brit who really just needs to shut up. But oh well

REMEMBER THE AMERICAN REVOLUTION! HAHA. SURRENDER AGAIN BITCHES!
[/quote]I’m Canadian. As I stated before.

Stupid fuck.[/quote]

Blame Canada?

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:105, topic:241531”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=317880.msg2528465#msg2528465 date=1226338519]
The only reason the Americans won was because they were little assholes who didn’t follow the rules of war. They turned it into a guerilla war.

BTW, the bombing of Hiroshima and that other city can be considered a war crime.
[/quote]
They warned the Japanese.[/quote]

That doesn’t matter, it’s still a war crime. So if Milosevic, Karadzic and others warned the muslims, it wouldn’t be genocide?

item.title: If you want to talk about the American election
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

I have no reason to continue this, you ignored my last post but just to clear up your misinformed history:

  • The Americans allied with France who then pulled in Spain. Before this we had the upper hand.
  • The “revolution” as you call it was actually just a treaty that replaced British government with local government.
  • We still had colonies over there which we later gave up. (Not surrender - there was no war involved)
  • We surrendered but so did you on multiple occasions, if you read up on the war the British army had the upper hand most of the time and if you take into consideration the war wasn’t popular at home (in the UK) and we had to ship troops over the Atlantic ocean I’d say we did a hell of a lot fucking better than you did.

Anyway I broke my own rule of not debating this with you, luckily this is my first and last post on the matter because all either us did was read about it in a History book. I don’t even have to mention the fact that American textbooks are biased for patriotic reasons.

Read full topic
item.source: If you want to talk about the American election
